mapper.select: select * from member where id not in ('admin123')
select count(*) from member where signup_date between to_date('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('2023-03-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and id not in ('admin123')
select count(*) from member where signup_date between to_date('2023-04-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('2023-06-30', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and id not in ('admin123')
select count(*) from member where signup_date between to_date('2023-07-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('2023-09-30', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and id not in ('admin123')
select count(*) from member where signup_date between to_date('2023-10-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('2023-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and id not in ('admin123')
mapper.insert:
insert into member( name id, email, phone, signUp_date )values
( #{item.name}, #{item.id}, #{item.mail}, #{item.num}, #{item.date}, )
